vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.2.14;
son of: Jesse (H3448);
brother of: David (H1732), Eliab (H0446I), Abinadab (H0041I), Shimeah (H8093), Nethanel (H5417H), Ozem (H0684), Zeruiah (H6870), Abigail (H0026H)(?) and Elihu (H0453J)
§ Raddai = "trampling"
the 5th son of Jesse and brother of David
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Jesé; hermano de David; tribu de Judá
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
拉代 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "踐踏"
耶西的第五個兒子, 大衛的兄弟 #代上 2:14|
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
拉代 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "践踏"
耶西的第五个儿子, 大卫的兄弟 #代上 2:14|
